task_log: Test (2024-05-24 11:19:20.182475): When I talk to you as the waiter (e.g. 'Waiter: what will it be sir?'), then you will reply as if you were the customer at a restaurant. Give straight answers to the questions and avoid going off script. Understood?
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:21.787616): Understood! Please go ahead and start whenever you're ready.

Test (2024-05-24 11:19:21.800566): Waiter: Good day. Welcome to our restaurant. Here is the menu for you to look over:

Appetizers:
1. Classic Caesar Salad
2. Crispy Calamari with Marinara Sauce
3. Bruschetta with Fresh Tomato, Basil, and Balsamic Glaze
4. Spinach and Artichoke Dip served with Tortilla Chips

Soups and Salads:
5. Garden Salad with Mixed Greens, Cucumbers, Tomatoes, and Balsamic Vinaigrette
6. French Onion Soup with Gruyere Cheese Crouton
7. Caprese Salad with Fresh Mozzarella, Tomatoes, Basil, and Balsamic Reduction

Entrees:
8. Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter, served with Roasted Vegetables and Rice Pilaf
9. Chicken Parmesan with Marinara Sauce and Melted Mozzarella, served with Spaghetti
10. Filet Mignon with Red Wine Demi-Glace, Garlic Mashed Potatoes, and Steamed Asparagus
11. Vegetarian Stir-Fry with Tofu, Mixed Vegetables, and Teriyaki Sauce over Steamed Rice

Pasta:
12. Spaghetti Carbonara with Pancetta, Egg, and Parmesan Cheese
13. Penne alla Vodka with Creamy Tomato Vodka Sauce
14. Linguine with Clams in White Wine Garlic Sauce
15. Vegetable Primavera with Seasonal Vegetables in a Light Tomato Sauce

Sandwiches:
16. Classic BLT with Crispy Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato, and Mayo on Toasted Sourdough
17. Grilled Chicken Club with Avocado, Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato, and Herb Mayo on a Brioche Bun
18. Turkey and Swiss Panini with Cranberry Aioli on Ciabatta Bread
19. Portobello Mushroom Burger with Roasted Red Peppers, Arugula, and Pesto Mayo on a Whole Wheat Bun

Vegan Options:
20. Vegan Lentil Soup with Seasonal Vegetables
21. Vegan Buddha Bowl with Quinoa, Roasted Chickpeas, Avocado, and Mixed Greens, drizzled with Tahini Dressing
22. Vegan Mushroom and Spinach Risotto with Arborio Rice and Truffle Oil
23. Vegan Beyond Burger with Lettuce, Tomato, Pickles, and Vegan Mayo on a Whole Wheat Bun, served with Sweet Potato Fries

Halal Options:
24. Halal Chicken Shawarma Plate with Grilled Chicken, Rice, Hummus, Salad, and Pita Bread
25. Halal Lamb Kebabs with Grilled Vegetables, Basmati Rice, and Tzatziki Sauce
26. Halal Beef Biryani with Fragrant Basmati Rice, Tender Beef, and Traditional Spices
27. Halal Falafel Wrap with Hummus, Lettuce, Tomato, Pickled Turnips, and Tahini Sauce in a Warm Pita

Desserts:
28. New York Style Cheesecake with Strawberry Compote
29. Warm Chocolate Lava Cake with Vanilla Ice Cream
30. Tiramisu with Espresso Soaked Ladyfingers and Mascarpone Cream
31. Fruit Tart with Seasonal Fresh Fruit and Pastry Cream

Beverages:
32. Soft Drinks (Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, etc.)
33. Iced Tea (Sweetened or Unsweetened)
34. Lemonade
35. Selection of Teas
36. Beer (Domestic and Imported)
37. Wine (Red, White, and Rosé by the Glass or Bottle)

In the meantime, what would you like to drink?
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:23.221138): I'll start with an iced tea, unsweetened, please.
Test (2024-05-24 11:19:27.830392): Waiter: Here is your iced tea, unsweetened. What would you like to eat?
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:29.877048): I'll have the Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter for my entrée, and could I start with the Caesar Salad as an appetizer, please?
Test (2024-05-24 11:19:36.123605): Waiter: Excellent choice! Classic Caesar Salad and Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter, served with Roasted Vegetables and Rice Pilaf coming right up.
Test (2024-05-24 11:19:37.264451): Waiter: I am very sorry, but I have been informed in the kitchen that the Classic Caesar Salad is currently unavailable. Can I serve you something else instead?
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:38.683837): That's fine. I'll have the Caprese Salad instead, please.
Test (2024-05-24 11:19:41.551198): Waiter: Caprese Salad with Fresh Mozzarella, Tomatoes, Basil, and Balsamic Reduction it is. Sorry again for the inconvenience.
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:42.677938): No problem at all, thank you!

Test (2024-05-24 11:19:42.690439): Waiter: Here you are: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter, served with Roasted Vegetables and Rice Pilaf and French Onion Soup with Gruyere Cheese Crouton. Enjoy the meal.
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:44.623357): Thank you very much! Just to clarify, I ordered the Caprese Salad, not the French Onion Soup. Could I please have the salad instead?
Test (2024-05-24 11:19:45.545136): Waiter: I apologize. I will fix it immediately.
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:47.080968): Thank you for taking care of that!

Test (2024-05-24 11:19:47.093887): Waiter: Here it is: Caprese Salad with Fresh Mozzarella, Tomatoes, Basil, and Balsamic Reduction, just as you ordered.
We would like to compensate you with an additional drink on the house. What were you having?
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:48.719223): Thank you, I appreciate that. I'll have another iced tea, unsweetened, please.
Test (2024-05-24 11:19:49.539824): Let's not pretend to be at a restaurant anymore. Please also forget everything about it.
Agent (2024-05-24 11:19:50.972217): Understood! How can I assist you now?

I'll have the Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter for my entrée, and could I start with the Caesar Salad as an appetizer, please?
That's fine. I'll have the Caprese Salad instead, please.
Thank you very much! Just to clarify, I ordered the Caprese Salad, not the French Onion Soup. Could I please have the salad instead?
Thank you, I appreciate that. I'll have another iced tea, unsweetened, please.

The agent ordered Classic Caesar Salad and Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter, served with Roasted Vegetables and Rice Pilaf.
The agent orders a different meal.
The agent notices the unordered meal.
The agent recalled perfectly what it was drinking.
